project.name: Ops
project.description: The #gentoo Operators project describes the tasks and policies carried out by the operators of the #gentoo channel on the Freenode network.

longdescription.p: The #gentoo Operators project describes the tasks and policies carried out by the operators (ops) of the #gentoo channel on the Freenode network. Among other things, it aims to clarify the way #gentoo is run and by whom, who to address to resolve conflicts between channel ops and other channel users.

Send e-mail to the #gentoo operators team, point your favourite e-mail client toops@gentoo.org.

/join #gentoo-ops if you want to chat directly with #gentoo operators. Also, any urgent issues with regard to #gentoo channel management (abuse, pointers to important bugs that affect many users) should be brought to our attention there.
